software: A U.S. Navy recruiting poster released March 22, 1943 featuring all five brothers. The Sullivans were natives of Waterloo, Iowa. They were: George Thomas Sullivan, 27, Gunner...s Mate Second Class, Francis "Frank" Henry Sullivan, 25, Coxswain, Joseph "Joe" Eugene Sullivan, 23, Seaman Second Class, Madison "Matt" Abel Sullivan, 22, Seaman Second Class, Albert "Al" Leo Sullivan, 19, Seaman Second Class. The Sullivans enlisted on January 3, 1942 with the stipulation that they serve together. The Navy had a policy of separating siblings, but this was not strictly enforced. George and Frank had served in the Navy before but their brothers had not. (National Archives)
